title.narrative: Building resilience and adaptation to climate extremes and disasters programme (BRACED) Ethiopia

description.narrative: BRACED Ethiopia is a multidisciplinary and multi-stakeholder initiative empowering vulnerable people in Oromia and Southern Nations Nationalities and Peoples Regions (SNNPRs) to build resilience to climate extremes and disasters. Our ‘complete’ approach pursues a high impact communications strategy using local radio and mobile phones to link regular, reliable and user-friendly climate information from local climate service providers to a large number of at-risk people.

mailing-address.narrative: Christian Aid, 35-41 Lower Marsh, London SE1 7RL, United Kingdom
